channel.title: Knowledgedoc Technical Writing Blog
channel.description: The Knowledgedoc blog features discussions of the technical writing profession, knowledge management techniques and tips for writing, editing, formatting and using documentation based software applications.

item.title: Capturing content for mobile devices
item.description: I’m a dinosaur when it comes to mobile devices. What did I do when faced with capturing content for a mobile app from an iPhone? Call in one of the children to help of course.
